content: Guild.xyz is a platform that allows users to create private, tokenized communities or "guilds" across different communication platforms, management tools, and games. The platform offers a variety of features for community management, including automated membership management, token-enabled membership levels, protection against phishing attacks, a real-time query engine, and composable membership requirements. Guild.xyz also supports cross-chain token gating and has dedicated support, open-source code, and an API/SDK for developers. The platform is designed to be user-friendly and accessible, with tutorials and updates available to help users get started.
